price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߟߌߟߌߟߊ ߞߊߕߙߍ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߡߵߊ߬ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߬ߢߍ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߝߕߌ߬ߣߊ߲߬ ߦߋߟߋ߲ߡߊ
arabic: وَدَاعِيًا إِلَى ٱللَّهِ بِإِذۡنِهِۦ وَسِرَاجٗا مُّنِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wadāʿiyan ilā al-lahi bi-idh'nihi wasirājan munīran
